0.question:
Consider a regular four-sided spinner with three Hazel sections and one Green section. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of Hazels (H) and Greens (G) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) GHHGHGGH.
(b) GHHGHHGGH.
(c) GHHGHGGHG.

1.question:
Consider a regular eight-sided die with five blue faces and three cyan faces. The die will be rolled 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and cyans (C) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive rolls of the die.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) CBCC.
(b) BCBCC.
(c) CCBCC.

2.question:
Consider a regular eight-sided die with five hazel faces and three white faces. The die will be rolled 15 times and the sequence of hazels (H) and whites (W) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive rolls of the die.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) WHHHWWH.
(b) WHHHHWWH.
(c) WHHHWWHW.

3.question:
Consider a regular four-sided spinner with three Hazel sections and one Amber section. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of Hazels (H) and Ambers (A) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) HHAAHH.
(b) HHHAAHH.
(c) HAHAAHH.

4.question:
Consider a spinner with eight sections, four lavender and two white. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of lavender (L) and white (W) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) LLWWWLLL.
(b) LLWLWWLLL.
(c) LLWWWWLLL.
